cos3

public static float cos3(float[] v,
                         float[] w)
                  throws ArrayUtil.IllPosedException
Get the cosine of the angle between two vectors.

Parameters:
v - First vector. Magnitude ignored, if non-zero.
w - First vector. Magnitude ignored, if non-zero.
Returns:
Cosine of angle between two vectors.
Throws:
ArrayUtil.IllPosedException - bad geometry

sin3

public static float sin3(float[] v,
                         float[] w)
                  throws ArrayUtil.IllPosedException
Get the sine of the angle between two vectors Always positive.

Parameters:
v - First vector. Magnitude ignored, if non-zero.
w - First vector. Magnitude ignored, if non-zero.
Returns:
Sine of angle between two vectors, always positive.
Throws:
ArrayUtil.IllPosedException - bad geometry

                             float c)

Parameters:
out - add result to this vector
v - Input vector.
c - Multiply input vector v by this value before adding.

                                 float[] p2)
Create a vector pointing from one point to another.

Parameters:
p1 - The returned vector begins at this point.

flip3

public static void flip3(float[] v,
                         int verticalDimension,
                         boolean up)
Reverse the direction of a vector to point up or down, according to the sign of the third dimension.

Parameters:
v - Vector to flip
verticalDimension - This
up - If true, then ensure v[verticalDimension] is negative, so that vector points up toward decreasing depths. If false, ensure v[verticalDimension] is positive, pointing toward increasing depths.

Returns:
Array of integers in random order, with unique values from 0 to length-1.
